entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:33 p.m. MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:34 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:34 PM MST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
